pr_title: [BEAM-5605, BEAM-2939] Add support for FnApiDoFnRunner to handle split calls.

timeline.message:
[BEAM-5605, BEAM-2939] Add support for FnApiDoFnRunner to handle split calls.

The next step is to plumb the split request to the BeamFnDataReadRunner which will forward it to the FnApiDoFnRunner.

timeline.bodyText: Why do we want to checkpoint after processElement finishing?
timeline.author: boyuanzz

replies.bodyText:
The DoFn returned ProcessContinuation#resume and not ProcessContinuation#stop.
The current restriction within the restriction tracker represents the entire restriction so splitting it provides the remainder and should update the restriction tracker so that the primary is in a done state so that checkDone down below can succeed.
replies.author: lukecwik
